about_the_game:
Battle and platform your way through a procedurally generated, RPG world. Explore mind-bending, bone-breaking dungeons, discover secrets, and learn skills from intimidating knights and mystic wizards as you vanquish the ultimate evil!

You, a run-of-the-mill knight, must venture forth to each region's temple, liberating the sacred gems and returning them to their holy resting places. Who was once a ordinary knight will transform into a legend as you experience diverse random encounters, testing your combat and platforming skills, level up, acquire deadly equipment, interact with the citizenry, learn from legends, and discover countless secrets.

Explore the depths and secrets of a vast world

Every world and temple have their secrets: upgrades, items, moves, each completely changing how your journey works!

Destroy enemies in dark dungeons

Different enemies mean different weak spots. Vary your strategy or face doom!

World-changing Items vary gameplay

Find a mechanical drill to drill through rubble giving you shortcuts, or find a magical item that could mean the difference between destroying your next boss and dying.

Try a new world every time you die!

Each world is procedurally generated, and no world is significantly alike! Each temple and each random encounter is also procedural, keeping you on your toes!

content_descriptors.notes: All enemies can be killed violently and have gory depictions of death. Some enemies are vaguely human.

name: Ziircon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 (or equivalent) or better
  • Memory: 4112 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics i3 or better
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 (or equivalent) or better
  • Memory: 8224 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7950 or NVIDIA GTX 760
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

short_description: Ziircon is a RPG rogue-lite platformer, with procedurally generated mind-bending, bone-breaking dungeons. You rise from the dead, an average squire. You die and rise evermore to defeat what corrupted the world. The entire world crushes you over and over. Can you prevail over this challenge?
